backend/main.mo: Actor implementing CRUD operations for products stored in a Map with price in paise and auto-incrementing IDs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old products with price to new products using pricePaise while preserving IDs and nextId.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style file defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application controlling authentication, product/order state, notifications, and cross-tab order syncing.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for adding, editing, and deleting products with validation, dialogs, image uploads, and toasts.
frontend/src/components/HowToAddProducts: Instructional UI card providing step-by-step guidance for adding products with styled alerts and icons.
frontend/src/components/LoginView.tsx: Login form component validating credentials and invoking onLogin with admin or customer roles.
frontend/src/components/OrdersPanel.tsx: Admin panel listing orders grouped by customer with ability to clear history via confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/ShopView.tsx: Product listing view with search and sorting by sales frequency, supporting ordering and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: LocalStorage-backed hook providing order list, addition, and clearing functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Hook managing CRUD operations for products via backend actor using React Query for caching and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variable themes for light and dark modes, including colors and radius, and applies base body styles.
frontend/src/lib/productMapping.ts: Provides converters between backend and UI product formats, including bigint–price conversions and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a class name merge helper and a utility to extract safe error messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/types/order.ts: Defines the Order interface with product name, creation time, and optional customer name.
frontend/src/types/product.ts: Defines the Product interface with id, name, price string, and optional image.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom colors mapped to CSS variables, fonts, radii, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, known issues, and feature requirements for fixing product price handling and error visibility.
